title: Hell's Calling
description: She never meant to sell her soulâ€¦ least of all to Lucifer.The devil has taken her sister. Now she's going to bring her back.Luckily, she's not alone: An angel with a dark past. A wolf with anger issues. A hellhound who's actually quite cuddly.Yes, this is a journey into hell. Grab your tissues and snacks for this will be a rollercoaster into darkness.A reverse harem based on Dante's Inferno, but with a kickass heroine instead of a lovesick old poet.
author: Skye MacKinnon
